items.summary: Update Training Document #3 (title: "Transforming Adversity into Lasting Professional and Personal Maturity.") so the line-2 link text "The attached PDF file (11,939 KB)" opens the correct PDF instead of looping back to the website.

Add the reuploaded PDF file for Training Document #3 as a static frontend asset under the app’s /assets/ path, and ensure the backend’s Training Document #3 `documentUrl` exactly matches the stored filename (including spaces/case) so `getStaticAssetUrl(documentUrl)` resolves correctly.
plannedFiles: frontend/public/assets/Transforming Adversity into Lasting Professional and Personal Maturity.pdf
